}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1246-01000146-50Z" and "1602" appears to be :silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3008934 FCC photos]. *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-USBR700 MSQ-USBR700] (05/30/2016) {{see also|ASUS USB-AC56|ASUS PCE-AC68}}
<small> *The ASUS USB-AC68 is a pocket-sized WiFi USB adapter that provides notebooks :an instant upgrade to ultra-fast dual-band 802.11ac speeds of up to 1900Mbps. *It features a powerful three-transmit, four-receive (3x4) MIMO design with two external :antennas and ASUS AiRadar beamforming technology for outstanding signal coverage. *Additionally, this ASUS USB-AC68's USB 3.0 interface delivers up to 10x-faster data :transfer speeds, eliminating potential performance bottlenecks. *ASUS USB-AC68 includes a desktop cradle with an extension cord for flexible positioning :of the adapter to achieve performance, even in areas with troublesome Wi-Fi reception.
'''Key Features''' *The cost-effective alternative to buying a new laptop with integrated WiFi ac functionality. *Fast and hassle-free upgrading of laptops and computers with the latest WiFi ac standard. *Includes a desktop cradle with a USB extension cord for flexible positioning. *Fast, stable and interference-free data transmission at speeds up to 1900Mbps. *Smooth HD video streaming and online gaming. *Ultra-compact. Unobtrusive and minimalist design </small>
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://press.asus.com/PressReleases/p/ASUS-Showcases-Latest-Lineup-of-Lifestyle-Innovations-at-CES-2016 ''CES2016 Press Releases'' on '''Asus'''] *[http://www.asus.com/News/h8KckaxyH5DGAfJu ''ASUS Announces USB-AC68'' on '''Asus'''] *[http://www.wegotserved.com/2016/01/07/asus-usb-ac68-wi-fi-adapter-boosts-networking-older-pcs/ ''ASUS USB-AC68 Wi-Fi Adapter Boosts Networking'' on '''WeGotServed'''] *[https://www.broadbandbuyer.co.uk/products/25040-asus-usb-ac68/#content ''ASUS USB-AC68 AC1900 Dual-Band WiFi USB Adapter'' on '''BroadBandBuyer''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/36-reviews/reviews/220-asus-usb-ac68 ''Asus USB-AC68 AC1900 WiFi USB 3.0 Adapter'' Review on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-usb-ac68.shtml ''Asus USB-AC68 AC1900 WiFi USB 3.0 Adapter'' Review on '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/karty/asus_usb_ac68/ ''Asus USB-AC68 adapter WiFi USB 3.0 AC1900'' Review on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/204-asus-usb-ac68/ ''Asus USB-AC68'' Gallery on '''OpenITforum''']
